caseTitle: Pakistan Electronic Media Regulatory Authority (PEMRA) through its Chairman, Islamabad and another v. M/s ARY Communication Private Limited (ARY Digital) through its Chief Executive Officer, Karachi and another
authorJudge: Mr. Justice Syed Mansoor Ali Shah
tagline: PEMRA to consider the opinion of Councils of Complaints before passing any order of prohibition under section 27(a) of the PEMRA Ordinance, 2002 - the importance of tolerance under the Constitution - Scope and extent of freedom of expression and right to information - Elaboration of "commonly accepted standard of decency"
